text: [Ej ashoʙi pajomʙar] Afrode az şumo, ki dar rūzi ʙarxūrdi du gurūh [musulmonon va kofiron dar çangi Uhud] firor kardand, dar haqiqat şajton ononro ʙa saʙaʙi ʙa'ze az kirdor [va gunohon]-e, ki murtakiʙ şuda ʙudand, ʙa inhirof kaşond va, hatman, Alloh taolo az onon darguzaşt. Be gumon, Alloh taolo omurzandai ʙurdʙor ast
